sentences.en: Do you think he – or Dylan – is misguided?
sentences.cn: 你认为他或狄伦是步入歧途 吗 ?

sentences.en: He had come to this apartment in a misguided attempt to prevent her suicide.
sentences.cn: 他来到这座公寓,想阻止她自杀,但他的动机并不对头.

sentences.en: He is misguided in expecting honesty from her.
sentences.cn: 他误以为她能够以诚相待。

sentences.en: His parents still clung to the misguided belief that his common sense would keep him out of serious trouble.
sentences.cn: 他的父母依然错误地认为他的常识能让他远离大的麻烦。

sentences.en: His untidy clothes give one a misguided impression of him.
sentences.cn: 他衣冠不整往往给人一种假象.
对于这件事我被误导了[受别人的影响而存着错误的想法].

sentences.en: I was misguided into trusting him.
sentences.cn: 我得到错误印象而信任了他.

sentences.en: In a misguided attempt to be funny, he manages only offensiveness.
sentences.cn: 他本想表现得风趣一点，却弄巧成拙地冒犯了别人。

sentences.en: It isn't possible that you were so misguided as to think I would propose matrimony? "
sentences.cn: 你不会糊涂到认为我会向你求婚 吧 ?

sentences.en: Plenty of these actions have been misguided, but others have been necessary.
sentences.cn: 这些行动大都遭到误导, 但另一些却是有必要的.

sentences.en: She only did it in a misguided attempt to help.
sentences.cn: 她是要帮忙，只是想法不对头。

sentences.en: Their approach to the problem is fundamentally misguided.
sentences.cn: 他们解决这个问题的方法从根本上说是判断错误的.

sentences.en: There were some honest misguided people.
sentences.cn: 有些是误入歧途的老实人.

sentences.en: These misguided people go around preaching up violence.
sentences.cn: 这些误入歧途的人到处鼓吹暴力.

sentences.en: This newspaper has argued that it is often misguided, or worse.
sentences.cn: 这家报纸认为CSR观念经常被误导, 或者更糟.

sentences.en: You have been malicious, presumptuous and misguided; also your so - called facts are wrong.
sentences.cn: 你自己误入歧途, 还出言不逊,恶意中伤.你的那些 所谓 事实, 不过是姑妄之言.

trans.tran_cn: 被误导的，搞错的，误入歧途的
trans.tran_en: a misguided idea or opinion is wrong because it is based on a wrong understanding of a situation
